body.raw:
{
  "name": "Loan contract number 1",
  "parent_folder_id": "<paste parent folder id here>",
  "renditions": [],
  "properties": {
    "value": 10,
    "status": "CREATED",
    "requester_email": "demoperson@innovatecorp.com",
    "risk_classification": 1,
    "extracted_terms": [
      "**Social Security Numbers:",
      "**Credit Card Numbers:",
      "**Bank Accounts:",
      "**Person Names:",
      "Peter M. Townsend",
      "Tomas U. Britton",
      "**Phone Numbers:",
      "**Addresses:",
      "1200 Irwinton Avenue",
      "92 Homer Avenue",
      "**Geographic Locations:",
      "Helena, Georgia",
      "State of Georgia",
      "**Organization Names:",
      "The Company"
    ],
    "monthly_installments": 24,
		"yearly_income": 50000
  },
  "traits": {
    "ca_approval": {
      "Automatic Approval": {
        "is_required": true,
        "has_been_granted": false,
        "approver": "",
        "approver_role": ""
      },
      "Line Manager Approval": {
        "is_required": false,
        "has_been_granted": false,
        "approver": "",
        "approver_role": ""
      },
      "Risk Manager Approval": {
        "is_required": false,
        "has_been_granted": false,
        "approver": "",

      },
      "Solvency Check": {
        "is_required": true,
        "has_been_granted": false,
        "approver": "",
        "approver_role": ""
      }
    }
  }
}
